us.phonetic: /ˈɪnvəlɪd/, (in′və lid, Brit. in′və lēd′ for 1; in val′id for 2)

example.eg: He was driving on an invalid driving licence.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 无效的，不被法律认可的

example.eg: You can shout all you like, but your arguments are completely invalid.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 无效果的, 无价值的

example.eg: The invalid command was ignored by the system.
Her mother's an invalid, confined to a wheelchair.
She cares full time for her invalid father.
